text: c (form-holding) blueprint through which your race consciousness manifests. You have learned that earthly consciousness is directly affected by the condition and structure of the physical body and bio- energetic systems, and that the DNA imprint which sets the biological struc- ture for the body, is directly manifested through a morphogenetic field. The personal morphogenetic field directs the design of the DNA, and thus the body and the quality of consciousness that will be expressed through that body. The personal morphogenetic field exists within the larger morphoge- netic fields of the race and the species. The species morphogenetic field is the Sphere of Amenti. The Sphere of Amenti connects the human species to the greater morphogenetic field of the Earth, which, in turn, is connected to the morphogenetic field of planet Tara in HU-2.
